description: A very early experimental work-in-progress package to help provide game engine functionality for react-three-fiber

scripts.build-worker: tsdx build --entry src/main/worker/worker.ts --name worker && rm -rf temp && mkdir temp && mv dist/* temp/
scripts.build-worker-final: mkdir dist/worker && mv temp/* dist/worker && rm -rf temp
scripts.build-worker-app: tsdx build --entry src/main/worker/app/index.tsx --name physicsApp && rm -rf temp3 && mkdir temp3 && mv dist/* temp3/
scripts.build-worker-app-final: mkdir dist/worker/app && mv temp3/* dist/worker/app && rm -rf temp3
scripts.build-logic-worker: tsdx build --entry src/logic/logicWorkerApp/index.tsx --name workerApp && rm -rf temp2 && mkdir temp2 && mv dist/* temp2/
scripts.build-logic-worker-final: mkdir dist/logicWorkerApp && mv temp2/* dist/logicWorkerApp && rm -rf temp2
scripts.build: npm run build-logic-worker && npm run build-worker && npm run build-worker-app && tsdx build && npm run build-worker-final && npm run build-worker-app-final && npm run build-logic-worker-final

name: react-three-game-engine
